titles.title: To prohibit the National Endowment for the Arts to use funds to make grants for Literature Fellowships: Translation Projects.
To prohibit the National Endowment for the Arts to use funds to make grants for Literature Fellowships: Translation Projects.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education and Workforce Training.

bill.summary: This bill prohibits the use of any funds made available to the National Endowment for the Arts to make grants for Literature Fellowships: Translation Projects.
